ErrorModel.start_message:
Welcome to the automatic spelling correction component. You can enter a phrase with typos and get it back corrected. Example:

helllo

model prediction: hello
ErrorModel.help_message:
Welcome to the automatic spelling correction component. You can enter a phrase with typos and get it back corrected. Example:

helllo

model prediction: hello

GoalOrientedBot.start_message: Welcome to the UI of the Dialogue Manager for goal-oriented task. This model can handle a goal-oriented conversation in a restaurant advisory domain. Enter any phrase to start interacting with model.
GoalOrientedBot.help_message: Welcome to the UI of the Dialogue Manager for goal-oriented task. This model can handle a goal-oriented conversation in a restaurant advisory domain. Enter any phrase to start interacting with model.

KerasIntentModel.start_message:
Welcome to the UI for the user intent classification model, trained on DSTC 2 dataset [CITE]. You can enter enter a text string and get intents (classes which a request belongs with). Example:

hey! I want cheap chinese restaurant

model prediction: ['inform_food' 'inform_pricerange']
KerasIntentModel.help_message:
Welcome to the UI for the user intent classification model, trained on DSTC 2 dataset [CITE]. You can enter enter a text string and get intents (classes which a request belongs with). Example:

hey! I want cheap chinese restaurant

model prediction: ['inform_food' 'inform_pricerange']
